column3: Heh, piling hacks on the the hack, eh? Assuming this works (seems to be!) please update the comment at the top of the yml as well.\n

Yep, it's been working nicely for BFGMiner for a while now: https://travis-ci.org/luke-jr/bfgminer

Might as well use it here, too. Handy to know what the difference is when just one build fails.
